meanings.definition: The act of sharing a car journey with others, typically to save money or reduce emissions.
meanings.sent1: Carpooling is when friends ride together in one car to work.
meanings.sent2: We decided to start carpooling to school to help the environment.
meanings.sent3: The carpooling group had so much fun singing along to their favorite songs on the way to the beach.
meanings.sent4: In the world of carpooling, every seat is a chance to make a new friend.
meanings.sent5: The concept of carpooling is like a green superhero, fighting against pollution and high gas prices.

meanings.definition: A group of people who regularly travel together in one vehicle.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the carpooling of coworkers arrived at the office together.
meanings.sent2: The carpooling to the soccer game made the long drive more enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The carpooling gang always had the best snacks for their road trips.
meanings.sent4: Their carpooling crew was like a little family on wheels, sharing stories and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The carpooling buddies had a special bond that grew stronger with each shared ride.
